Key Match Events: James Harden hit go-ahead free throws with 17.9 seconds left
Ivica Zubac won the tip back to Harden, who made two more free throws with less than two seconds remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans led by as many as 14 points
The Clippers converted 14 offensive rebounds into 20 second-chance points
Others: Los Angeles Clippers held on to defeat the New Orleans Pelicans 116-113
Dejounte Murray had 13 points, 10 rebounds and six steals
CJ McCollum hit eight 3s and led New Orleans with 33 points
Herbert Jones and Trey Murphy each scored 18 points
